Author: elite-alien
Text: I go between 122-150-115 in a continuous cycle. It's awful. I look in the mirror and I don't recognize myself, yet I always see the same thing no matter what I've gained/lost. I just joined a gym so hopefully I'll get somewhere there. Just because you call yourself big doesn't mean you are! That's all part of the ED! I bet you're beautiful and an amazing mother. Just keep reminding yourself that food = energy, that's what I do.

Author: ilivetomosh
Text: Omg you're literally my height and my lw was 122. ðŸ˜­ I'll be honest I was scoping you out from your most recent post, bc idk I was curious, there are people (like me) in the ed community who call themselves big and actually are and idk I'm a creep I guess, so i wanted to know and holy fuck you're like everything I'm aspiring for rn lmaoooo. Just had a baby ( a year ago!) And still haven't lost the weight. I'm a literal whale rn.
